name: AD Pipeline - rules
description: Pulling just the pipeline and rules for monitoring. Events renamed with prefix winlogbeat_

description.@value:
Group Member Deleted - AD or Local [4733, 4729, 4757, 4747, 4752, 4762]
| Alert Priority 2

Group Membership Add - AD or Local [4732, 4728, 4756, 4746, 4751, 4761]
| Alert Priority 2

P1P2 Marker for Alert Conditions
| Alert Priority 1 & 2

source.@value:
rule "AP1-2_Create_Alert_Marker"
when
    NOT has_field("Alert")
then
    set_field("ALERT","TRUE");
end

description.@value:
Group Changed - AD or Local [4735, 4737, 4755, 4745, 4750, 4760]
| Alert Priority 2

Group Deleted - AD or Local [4734, 4730, 4758, 4748, 4753, 4763]
| Alert Priority 2

Bad password [4625]
| Alert Priority 3 -
P3-Reporting
P3-Password

Admin Changed user Password [4724]
| Alert Priority 2
Pass through anything that is Windows Security Information events for ALL stages

source.@value:
rule "WinSECAlert StageOne"
when
  // Narrows and provideds clarity for what is coming through here
  $message.beats_type         == "winlogbeat"                       AND
  $message.winlogbeat_winlog_channel     == "Security"                         AND
  $message.log_level          == "information"                      AND
  has_field("winlogbeat_winlog_event_id")                                      AND
  has_field("winlogbeat_winlog_task")                                          AND
    (
     $message.winlogbeat_winlog_task     == "Logon"                            OR
     $message.winlogbeat_winlog_task     == "Kerberos Authentication Service"  OR
     $message.winlogbeat_winlog_task     == "User Account Management"          OR
     $message.winlogbeat_winlog_task     == "Directory Service Changes"        OR
     $message.winlogbeat_winlog_task     == "Security Group Management"
     )
then
  //Allow this to pass through
  //set the fist line of the event... to the period... to be the action
  let firstline = grok("%{GREEDYDATA:action}.", to_string($message.message), true);

  set_fields(firstline);
  
end

description.@value:
Group Created - AD or Local [4731, 4727, 4754, 4744, 4749, 4759]
| Alert Priority 2

User Account Name Change [4781]
| Alert Priority 2

WinSECAlert Stage Zero Drop Set -    Messages with the following will be dropped (not alerted, not recorded) 
**** Be careful with this - If you don't want alerting, it is better to 
* Shunt the message to P3-Reporting
* add a line to ignore it in "AP1-2_Create_Alert_Marker"
* Let it die a short death in WinShortLifeStream
